steps: In a blender or food processor, blend the frozen berries so they are powdery or in tiny pieces. Stir all dry ingredients together in a bowl, then stir in nut butter. Add in honey/agave and mix until sticky dough forms.
Line a pan with parchment paper, add the mix and spread evenly. Freeze for 1 hour or longer.
Remove from freezer and cut into bars.
Store at room temperature or in the fridge for 2-3 days, or freeze up to a month.

ingredients.ingredient: peanut butter or nut butter of choice
